resources.string:
Fruit Crush
Version 1.0

Enjoy this exciting fruit matching game! Connect similar fruits to blast them away and score high.

Developed by: Tushar and Suraj
Contact: noadsapk@gmail.com

Â© 2025 All Rights Reserved.

Privacy Policy for Fruit Crush

 Effective Date: October 26, 2023

 1. Information Collection
 We do not collect any personal information from our users. This app operates locally on your device.

 2. Usage of Information
 Since we do not collect personal data, we do not use, sell, or share any user data.

 3. Third-Party Services
 This app may use third-party services (e.g., AdMob, Google Play Services) that may collect information used to identify you. Please refer to their respective privacy policies.

 4. Children's Privacy
 We do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13.

 5. Changes to This Policy
 We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. You are advised to review this page periodically for any changes.

 6. Contact Us
 If you have any questions or suggestions about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us at noadsapk@gmail.com.
